page.title: 06ECOLOGY WIDEWATER CONTINUED
page.content: The wildlife includes birds & fish the vegetation includes everything from common garden weeds to more excotic named plants like the Ivy Leaved Toad- flax & the Bearded Hawks Beard these names we thought were the most unusual The fish in the Widewater are Stickle- backs and minos they are only small. There are a wide range of different kinds of birds these include Gulls, Swans,Ducks & Moorhens.There are the common birds & rarer breeds including the Red Breasted Merganser & the Purple Sandpiper.The Widewater is a very good place for wildlife & well worth going to see.Alot of the animals & birds breed at the Widewater.The council plan to remove litter from the Widewater & clear all brambles.They plan to build a new island & destroy an old one. By Maria,Sharrel & Maija Irene Avenue Middle School Lancing sx.
